participant_abstract.sent: The meeting was very brief, but pleasant.
We started by introducing ourselves, a much-needed thing since I did not know any of the team members.
Next we drew some animals, were I was able to demonstrate my ability to communicate through pictures.
Talking about the actual project, I didn't have a whole lot to add to the discussion.
Fortunately, the other members seemed to have a keen interest in moving things along.
I suppose the next meeting will be more detail-oriented, and as the industrial designer, that means I'll have to come up with something.

participant_actions.sent: Project manager and marketing guy: market research.
User interface designer: user survey, novel design.
Me: nitty-gritty grunt work to magically make it all happen.

participant_decisions.sent: The materials should be really cheap.
there ought to be some feature for finding the remote control, such as whistling for it.

participant_problems.sent: who would really buy a remote control for 25 euros?
The size dillemma: too small and it gets lost; too many buttons =3D too big and cumbersome.
